Public service cuts: 303 jobs to go at Ministry for the Environment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-service-cuts-303-jobs-to-go-at-ministry-for-the-environment/HGKKG3YLUBBLJOHL5ML2IMJDMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-service-cuts-303-jobs-to-go-at-ministry-for-the-environment/HGKKG3YLUBBLJOHL5ML2IMJDMI/ Jamie MortonThe environment ministry's workforce is proposed to be slashed by one third. Wed, 05 Jun 2024 02:12:49 +0000 In the latest of a sweeping series of cost-cutting restructures across the public sector, the Ministry for the Environment today announced plans deleting 303 roles by July next year – about 30 per cent of 993 positions filled currently. Photo / Mark Mitchell
